amendment.description: To require completion of the feasibility study required by Public Law 105-245, and the other requirements of that law relating to construction of an emergency outlet at Devils Lake, North Dakota, before any appropriated funds are spent for the project.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 214 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 34. Record Vote Number: 22.

Amendment SA 214 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S1393-1398, S1403-1404; text: CR S1393) To require completion of the feasibility study required by Public Law 105-245, and the other requirements of that law relating to construction of an emergency outlet at Devils Lake, North Dakota, before any appropriated funds are spent for the project.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 214 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 34. Record Vote Number: 22.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 214 proposed by Senator McCain.
